entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-02-19
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • New Document outline in VS2022 17.4 - font too small #72172
  • CS9210 regression in .NET 8.0.200 SDK #72170
  • Missing opportunity for a collection expression in a value tuple #72169
  • `IIncrementalGenerator` doesn't output file if class inherits from class in separate project #72167

Closed

  • dotnet 8.0.200 breaking change - wrong exception is thrown when rethrow in a catch inside another catch using async methods #72141
  • `RazorSourceGenerator` failed to initialize when building ASP.NET/Razor project in VS 17.10 Preview 1 #72139

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix broken link #72173
    Area-Compilers, Documentation, untriaged
  • Support UnscopedRef attribute on interface methods and properties #72171
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - RefStructInterfaces
  • Update SDK to 8.0.201 #72168
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • Reduce allocations in AbstractRecommendationServiceBasedCompletionProvider.GetSymbolsAsync #72157
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Cleanup handling of flags in internal syntax nodes. #72130
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Reduce allocations in TextDocumentStates.SelectAs* methods #72159
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Reduce allocations during check for duplicate analyzers #72144
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Improve codegen for concatenation of `string` and `char` (attempt 2) #71793
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Reduce symbol array allocations during CSharpSemanticModel.LookupSymbolsInternal #72153
  • Reduce string allocations from `GetCategoryBasedDotnetAnalyzerDiagnosticSeverityKey` #72163
    Area-Analyzers, Community, untriaged
  • Merge Lock object feature to main #72137
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Lock Type
  • Prepare the FabricBot config for migration to Policy Service #72127
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
